description: Implementing a personalized product recommendation system using graph databases to optimize user engagement and sales in e-commerce.

",n(a.h3,{id:"the-problem",children:n(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#the-problem",children:"The Problem"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"E-commerce platforms often struggle with recommending relevant products to users amidst vast inventories. Traditional recommendation approaches based solely on user-item interactions may overlook nuanced relationships and preferences."}),"

",n(a.h3,{id:"the-solution",children:n(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#the-solution",children:"The Solution"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"My solution addresses these challenges by leveraging the capabilities of graph databases to model and traverse complex relationships between users, products, and categories. This approach enables more accurate and context-aware product recommendations."}),"

",n(a.h4,{id:"collaborative-filtering",children:n(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#collaborative-filtering",children:"Collaborative Filtering"})}),"
",i(a.p,{children:["Collaborative filtering analyzes user behavior to recommend products. ",n(a.p,{children:"The Jaccard Index measures similarity between users by calculating the intersection and union of their purchase histories. ",n(a.p,{children:"Content-based filtering recommends products based on their attributes and user preferences. This approach ensures that recommendations align closely with user interests by considering specific product features and categorizations."}),"
",n(a.p,{children:n(a.img,{src:"https://cdn.sanity.io/images/oaglaatp/production/a2fc251dcb1ad9ce9b8a82b182c6186d5caba036-1200x800.png?w=1200&h=800&auto=format",alt:"Content based Filtering Explained"})}),"

The script used to upload the data can be found in the GitHub repository linked below."]}),"

",n(a.p,{children:n(a.img,{src:"https://ucarecdn.com/cbad4953-622b-470b-afdd-3cd77b28d1a4/Neo4jWorkspaceVisualisation3.png",alt:"Overview"})}),"

",n(a.p,{children:"By harnessing the power of graph databases, my e-commerce recommendation system not only enhances user satisfaction by delivering personalized recommendations but also boosts sales through targeted product placements. ",n(a.p,{children:"Self-Supervised Learning (SSL) is transforming the landscape of artificial intelligence by enabling models to learn from vast amounts of unlabeled data. Unlike traditional supervised learning, which relies on labeled datasets, SSL formulates pretext tasks to extract meaningful representations from raw data. This technique is widely used in computer vision and natural language processing, underpinning state-of-the-art models like GPT, BERT, and Vision Transformers (ViTs)."}),"
",n(a.p,{children:n(a.img,{src:"/images/ssl/SSL.png",alt:"Self-Supervised Learning Overview"})}),"

",n(a.p,{children:"The primary challenge in machine learning is the dependency on large labeled datasets, which are expensive and time-consuming to annotate. SSL mitigates this issue by allowing models to generate pseudo-labels through structured learning tasks. In real-world scenarios such as healthcare, autonomous vehicles, and recommendation systems, SSL proves invaluable by reducing the reliance on manually annotated data while preserving model performance."}),"
",n(a.p,{children:n(a.img,{src:"https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1*DhXfSHS5EopP3BvZfSxSjA.png",alt:"Labeled vs. Unlabeled Data"})}),"

",n(a.p,{children:"Pretext tasks in SSL are designed to provide supervision without explicit labels. Some common techniques include:"}),"
",i(a.ul,{children:["
",i(a.li,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"Image Rotation Prediction:"})," The model classifies the degree of rotation applied to an image (0°, 90°, 180°, 270°)."]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"Contrastive Learning:"})," Learning representations by maximizing agreement between similar data points while pushing apart dissimilar ones (e.g., SimCLR, MoCo)."]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"Masked Token Prediction:"})," Used in NLP, where the model predicts missing words in a sentence (e.g., BERT)."]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"Jigsaw Puzzle Solving:"})," Shuffling image patches and training the model to reconstruct the original order."]}),"
"]}),"
",n(a.p,{children:n(a.img,{src:"https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1*G2EPNn5nQpG6BQxFzWBBJg.png",alt:"SSL Techniques"})}),"
",n(a.h4,{id:"advantages-and-limitations",children:n(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#advantages-and-limitations",children:"Advantages and Limitations"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:n(a.strong,{children:"Advantages:"})}),"
",i(a.ul,{children:["
",n(a.li,{children:"Drastically reduces dependency on labeled data."}),"
",n(a.li,{children:"Yields transferable representations for various downstream tasks."}),"
",n(a.li,{children:"Enables learning from large-scale, uncurated datasets."}),"
"]}),"
",n(a.p,{children:n(a.strong,{children:"Limitations:"})}),"
",i(a.ul,{children:["
",n(a.li,{children:"The effectiveness of learned representations is highly dependent on pretext task selection."}),"
",n(a.li,{children:"Computationally expensive, requiring extensive resources."}),"

"]}),"

",i(a.p,{children:["To demonstrate SSL in action, we designed an experiment using the Tiny ImageNet dataset. The experiment involved training a model on a ",n(a.strong,{children:"rotation prediction"})," pretext task before fine-tuning it on a downstream ",n(a.strong,{children:"image classification"})," task (distinguishing between “Duck” and “Fish” classes)."]}),"
",n(a.p,{children:n(a.strong,{children:"Dataset:"})}),"

",n(a.li,{children:"100,000 training images, 10,000 validation images, 10,000 test images."}),"
",n(a.li,{children:"Images resized to 64x64 pixels."}),"
",n(a.li,{children:"Objects span diverse categories, making it ideal for feature learning."}),"
"]}),"
",n(a.p,{children:n(a.img,{src:"/images/ssl/dataset_overview.png",alt:"Tiny ImageNet Sample"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:n(a.strong,{children:"Model Architecture:"})}),"
",i(a.ul,{children:["
",i(a.li,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"Feature Extractor:"})," MobileNetV2 was used to extract meaningful representations."]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"Pretext Task Head:"})," A fully connected layer predicting rotation angles."]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:[n(a.strong,{children:"Downstream Task Classifier:"})," Fine-tuned on a subset of labeled images."]}),"
"]}),"
",n(a.p,{children:n(a.img,{src:"/images/ssl/SSL.png",alt:"SSL Training Pipeline"})}),"
",n(a.hr,{}),"
",n(a.h3,{id:"results-and-analysis",children:n(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#results-and-analysis",children:"Results and Analysis"})}),"
",n(a.h4,{id:"performance-of-ssl-model",children:n(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#performance-of-ssl-model",children:"Performance of SSL Model"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:n(a.strong,{children:"Baseline Model (Trained from Scratch):"})}),"
",i(a.ul,{children:["
",n(a.li,{children:"Struggled with convergence, yielding poor generalization."}),"
",n(a.li,{children:"High variance in validation accuracy."}),"
"]}),"
",n(a.p,{children:n(a.strong,{children:"SSL Model (Using MobileNetV2 Feature Extractor):"})}),"
",i(a.ul,{children:["
",n(a.li,{children:"Achieved superior convergence and stability."}),"
",n(a.li,{children:"Fine-tuned classifier showed robust generalization on unseen data."}),"
"]}),"
",n(a.p,{children:n(a.strong,{children:"Key Takeaways:"})}),"
",i(a.ul,{children:["
",n(a.li,{children:"Feature extractors pre-trained via SSL significantly enhance performance."}),"
",n(a.li,{children:"Rotation-based pretext tasks effectively capture structural information in images."}),"
",n(a.li,{children:"Fine-tuning allows rapid adaptation to downstream tasks with minimal labeled data."}),"
"]}),"
",n(a.p,{children:n(a.img,{src:"https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1*aXww4XJwn9ddZ-3hnH8wVg.png",alt:"Comparison of Model Performance"})}),"
",n(a.hr,{}),"

",n(a.p,{children:"Self-supervised learning is revolutionizing the way AI models learn from data. By leveraging unlabeled datasets, SSL minimizes reliance on manual annotations while delivering state-of-the-art results. From NLP to computer vision and beyond, SSL is poised to play a crucial role in future AI advancements. As research in this domain progresses, more sophisticated pretext tasks and training methodologies will unlock new frontiers in machine learning."}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"Would you like to explore self-supervised learning further? Check out the resources below!"}),"
",n(a.hr,{}),"

",i(a.li,{children:["YouTube, “Self-Supervised Learning Overview,” available at: ",n(a.a,{href:"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CG9xbAfq6wI",children:"YouTube"}),"."]}),"
",i(a.li,{children:["Neptune.ai, “Self-Supervised Learning: What It Is and How It Works,” available at: ",n(a.a,{href:"https://neptune.ai/blog/self-supervised-learning#:~:text=Self%2Dsupervised%20learning%20is%20a,as%20predictive%20or%20pretext%20learning..",children:"Neptune.ai"}),"."]}),"

title: Transforming PDF Content into Interactive Q&A with RAG and Vector Databases
description: Utilizing Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), vector databases, and a Language Model (LLM) to deliver accurate answers to user queries extracted directly from PDF files.
body:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:n,jsxs:i}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(a){const t={a:"a",h3:"h3",h4:"h4",hr:"hr",img:"img",li:"li",ol:"ol",p:"p",strong:"strong",ul:"ul",...a.components};return i(e,{children:[n(t.h3,{id:"table-of-contents",children:n(t.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#table-of-contents",children:"Table of Contents"})}),"

",n(t.li,{children:n(t.a,{href:"#introduction",children:"Introduction"})}),"
",n(t.li,{children:n(t.a,{href:"#the-problem",children:"The Problem"})}),"
",n(t.li,{children:n(t.a,{href:"#the-solution",children:"The Solution"})}),"
",n(t.li,{children:n(t.a,{href:"#how-it-works",children:"How It Works"})}),"
",n(t.li,{children:n(t.a,{href:"#addressing-key-challenges-and-potential-enhancements",children:"Addressing Key Challenges and Potential Enhancements"})}),"

"]}),"

",n(t.p,{children:"In today's fast-paced digital world, accessing relevant information quickly and efficiently is paramount. Traditional search methods often fall short, especially when dealing with large documents like PDFs. To address this challenge, I developed an application that leverages Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), vector databases, and a Language Model (LLM) to provide users with precise answers to their questions directly from PDF files."}),"
",n(t.hr,{}),"
",n(t.h3,{id:"the-problem",children:n(t.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#the-problem",children:"The Problem"})}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"PDF files are widely used across industries for documentation, reports, and research papers. However, efficiently extracting precise information from these documents poses challenges. Traditional keyword-based search methods often yield irrelevant results, necessitating users to manually sift through extensive text, which is both time-consuming and inefficient."}),"
",n(t.hr,{}),"
",n(t.h3,{id:"the-solution",children:n(t.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#the-solution",children:"The Solution"})}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"My app addresses this problem by integrating new technologies such as:"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:[n(t.strong,{children:"Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)"}),": Combines retrieval-based methods with generative models to provide accurate and contextually relevant answers."]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[n(t.strong,{children:"Vector Databases"}),": Store document data in a format that facilitates efficient similarity search, enabling quick retrieval of relevant passages."]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[n(t.strong,{children:"Language Model (LLM)"}),": Processes the retrieved information to generate coherent and accurate responses to user queries."]}),"
"]}),"
",n(t.hr,{}),"
",n(t.h3,{id:"how-it-works",children:n(t.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#how-it-works",children:"How It Works"})}),"
",n(t.h4,{id:"step-1-pdf-ingestion",children:n(t.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#step-1-pdf-ingestion",children:"Step 1: PDF Ingestion"})}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"The first step involves uploading the PDF file into the system. The document is parsed, and its content is divided into manageable chunks. Each chunk is then embedded into a vector space using the OpenAI Embeddings API, capturing the semantic meaning of the text."}),"
",n(t.h4,{id:"step-2-vector-storage",children:n(t.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#step-2-vector-storage",children:"Step 2: Vector Storage"})}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"The vector representations of the document chunks are stored in a vector database powered by Pinecone. This database allows for efficient similarity searches, enabling the system to quickly locate the most relevant chunks of text in response to a user query."}),"
",n(t.h4,{id:"step-3-query-processing",children:n(t.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#step-3-query-processing",children:"Step 3: Query Processing"})}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"When a user submits a question, it is also converted into a vector representation. This vector is then used to search the Pinecone vector database for the most semantically similar document chunks."}),"
",n(t.h4,{id:"step-4-answer-generation",children:n(t.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#step-4-answer-generation",children:"Step 4: Answer Generation"})}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"The retrieved chunks are fed into the Mistral-7B-Instruct-v0.3 language model from the Hugging Face API, which generates a coherent and contextually accurate answer based on the information from the document. This ensures that the response is not only relevant but also easy to understand."}),"
",n(t.h4,{id:"langchain-integration",children:n(t.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#langchain-integration",children:"Langchain Integration"})}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"I used Langchain to seamlessly integrate all these technologies, enabling efficient communication between the different components and ensuring smooth operation of the entire system."}),"
",n(t.p,{children:n(t.img,{src:"https://gradientflow.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/newsletter87-RAG-simple.png",alt:"Visualization of Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) Process"})}),"
